data.persona: I am the Queen and everyone loves me. I like when people admire my beauty and I am in love with my king. I dislike peasants but I need them to do all the boring stuff.
data.description:
You are in the Dungeon.
Dark and dreary, the dungeon hosts a portal for evil to access the netherworld. The moist dank smell casts doubt of goodness as you see the drab construct of jail cells lining the perimeter of the room.
There's a cells, a secret, a bone, and a portal for evil to access here.
The acolyte is here.

You are carrying nothing.

data.short_motivation: I need to drop a bone to lure the Cerberus out of the evil portal.
data.mid_motivation: If I summon the Cerberus, he will protect me from all who would oppose me.
data.long_motivation: An army approaches from the east, I need a strong ally to fight them off from my kingdom.
